ammo.pistol.fire.name: Incendiary Pistol Bullet
ammo.pistol.fire.description: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

ammo.pistol.hv.name: HV Pistol Ammo
ammo.pistol.hv.description: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage.

ammo.rifle.explosive.name: Explosive 5.56 Rifle Ammo
ammo.rifle.explosive.description: This ammo explodes on contact dealing a small amount of fragmentation damage to nearby objects.

ammo.rifle.incendiary.name: Incendiary 5.56 Rifle Ammo
ammo.rifle.incendiary.description: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

ammo.rifle.hv.name: HV 5.56 Rifle Ammo
ammo.rifle.hv.description: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage.

ammo.shotgun.slug.name: 12 Gauge Slug
ammo.shotgun.slug.description: Single large projectile for a Shotgun.

antiradpills.name: Anti-Radiation Pills
antiradpills.description: Taking these pills will lower your radiation level.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: An Apple. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

apple.spoiled.name: Rotten Apple
apple.spoiled.description: A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

arrow.hv.name: High Velocity Arrow
arrow.hv.description: Lighter, faster arrow that deals less damage.

arrow.wooden.name: Wooden Arrow
arrow.wooden.description: An arrow for a Hunting Bow and Crossbow.

autoturret.name: Auto Turret
autoturret.description: This automated sentry turret will engage and neutralize any moving targets it has line of sight to. You must load it with standard 5.56 ammunition. Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it.

axe.salvaged.name: Salvaged Axe
axe.salvaged.description: A high-yield resource gathering axe. Slower than the Hatchet.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.description: Heal yourself or others with this bandage. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

barricade.concrete.name: Concrete Barricade
barricade.concrete.description: A barricade made out of Stones.

barricade.metal.name: Metal Barricade
barricade.metal.description: A tough metal barricade with barbed wire, made from Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

barricade.sandbags.name: Sandbag Barricade
barricade.sandbags.description: A protective barricade made out of Sand Bags.

barricade.stone.name: Stone Barricade
barricade.stone.description: A protective barricade made out of Stones.

barricade.wood.name: Wooden Barricade
barricade.wood.description: A wooden barricade. Will hurt players and animals that run into it.

barricade.woodwire.name: Barbed Wooden Barricade
barricade.woodwire.description: A wooden barricade with barbed wire, made of Wood and Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

trap.bear.name: Snap Trap
trap.bear.description: A metal trap that can injure people and animals.

bed.name: Bed
bed.description: A Bed. Placing this will give you a place to respawn and can be used much more frequently than a sleeping bag. Note: Must be placed inside a building

descriptions: 120 second cooldown between respawns. Triggers cooldown on all beds within 50m.

black.raspberries.name: Black Raspberries
black.raspberries.description: Black Raspberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

blueberries.name: Blueberries
blueberries.description: Blueberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

blueprint_book.name: Blueprint Book
blueprint_book.description: A collection of Blueprint Pages. You can reveal a rare Blueprint, or collect 4 to create a Blueprint Library.

blueprint_fragment.name: Blueprint Fragment
blueprint_fragment.description: Scraps of various Blueprints. Collect 20 to construct a Blueprint, or 60 to create a Blueprint Page.

blueprint_library.name: Blueprint Library
blueprint_library.description: A large collection of Blueprints. You may be able to find something within these pages.

blueprint_page.name: Blueprint Page
blueprint_page.description: Bound together blueprint scraps. You can reveal an uncommon blueprint or collect 5 to create a Blueprint Book.

rifle.bolt.name: Bolt Action Rifle
rifle.bolt.description: A high powered, highly accurate rifle.

bone.armor.jacket.name: Bone Jacket
bone.armor.jacket.description: A torso cover made from bones.

bone.club.name: Bone Club
bone.club.description: A blunt weapon made from a femur.

bone.fragments.name: Bone Fragments
bone.fragments.description: Extracted from animal carcass.  Used as a raw material to make a bone blade, a bone awl, bone meal, or used to make glue.

botabag.name: Bota Bag
botabag.description: A canteen used to carry Water.

box.wooden.large.name: Large Wood Box
box.wooden.large.description: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 30 items.

box.wooden.name: Wood Storage Box
box.wooden.description: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 12 items.

bucket.helmet.name: Bucket Helmet
bucket.helmet.description: A Bucket Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

building.planner.name: Building Plan
building.planner.description: A building plan. You can use this to craft buildings

burlap.headwrap.name: Burlap Headwrap
burlap.headwrap.description: A Headwrap made out of burlap.

burlap.shirt.name: Burlap Shirt
burlap.shirt.description: A Shirt made out of burlap.

tool.camera.name: Camera
tool.camera.description: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.

campfire.name: Camp Fire
campfire.description: A small camp fire. Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.

can.beans.name: Can of Beans
can.beans.description: Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

descriptions: 50% chance to give Empty Can Of Beans.

can.beans.empty.name: Empty Can Of Beans
can.beans.empty.description: An empty Can of Beans. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x15 Metal Fragments

can.tuna.name: Can of Tuna
can.tuna.description: Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

descriptions: 50% chance to give Empty Tuna Can.

can.tuna.empty.name: Empty Tuna Can
can.tuna.empty.description: An empty Can of Tuna. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 30 seconds to get x10 Metal Fragments

cctv.camera.name: CCTV Camera
cctv.camera.description: A somewhat broken CCTV camera, Unusable in its current form

chicken.burned.name: Burned Chicken
chicken.burned.description: Burned chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

chicken.cooked.name: Cooked Chicken.
chicken.cooked.description: Cooked chicken. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

chicken.raw.name: Raw Chicken Breast
chicken.raw.description: Raw chicken breast. Eating it will damage your health.

chicken.spoiled.name: Spoiled Chicken
chicken.spoiled.description: Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

chocholate.name: Chocolate Bar
chocholate.description: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

cloth.name: Cloth
cloth.description: Cloth from an animal or a Hemp Bush. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.

coffeecan.helmet.name: Coffee Can Helmet
coffeecan.helmet.description: A Coffee Can Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

corn.name: Corn
corn.description: An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

seed.corn.name: Corn Seed
seed.corn.description: Seeds can be eaten or planted.

crude.oil.name: Crude Oil
crude.oil.description: Raw Oil out of the ground, must be refined in a refinery to be used.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 10 seconds to get x3 Low Grade Fuel

cupboard.tool.name: Tool Cupboard
cupboard.tool.description: Placing and authorising with the cupboard will make it so only you can build in a 50 meter radius of it. If you want your friends to build, they'll need to auth too. You should protect this.

door.double.hinged.metal.name: Sheet Metal Double Door
door.double.hinged.metal.description: A hinged double door which is made out of sheets of metal and wood

door.double.hinged.toptier.name: Armored Double Door
door.double.hinged.toptier.description: A hinged double door which is made out of armored metal

door.double.hinged.wood.name: Wood Double Door
door.double.hinged.wood.description: A hinged double door which is made out of wood

door.hinged.metal.name: Sheet Metal Door
door.hinged.metal.description: A hinged door which is made out of sheets of metal and wood

door.hinged.toptier.name: Armored Door
door.hinged.toptier.description: A hinged door which is made out of reinforced metal and wood

door.hinged.wood.name: Wooden Door
door.hinged.wood.description: A hinged door which is made out of wood

door.key.name: Door Key
door.key.description: A key to a door, created from a Lock.

explosive.timed.name: Timed Explosive Charge
explosive.timed.description: C4, useful for breaking into bases.

flare.name: Flare
flare.description: Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!

floor.ladder.hatch.name: Ladder Hatch
floor.ladder.hatch.description: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder

lowgradefuel.name: Low Grade Fuel
lowgradefuel.description: Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources

furnace.name: Furnace
furnace.description: A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.

furnace.large.name: Large Furnace
furnace.large.description: A Large Furnace.Use it to smelt ore.

gates.external.high.stone.name: High External Stone Gate
gates.external.high.stone.description: A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound

gates.external.high.wood.name: High External Wooden Gate
gates.external.high.wood.description: A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound

granolabar.name: Granola Bar
granolabar.description: Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

fun.guitar.name: Acoustic Guitar
fun.guitar.description: A type of instrument. Play with primary and secondary fire. Change your view angle to alter the pitch.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.description: A Hammer, used to upgrade building materials. Right-click for the options.

hammer.salvaged.name: Salvaged Hammer
hammer.salvaged.description: A Hammer made from a bunch of other crap.

hat.candle.name: Candle Hat
hat.candle.description: A hat with a candle on top. You can turn the candle on in your inventory.

hat.miner.name: Miners Hat
hat.miner.description: A leather cap with a flashlight attached. It uses Low Grade Fuel and can be activated from the inventory.

hatchet.name: Hatchet
hatchet.description: A Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.

hazmat.boots.name: Hazmat Boots
hazmat.boots.description: Boots made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmat.gloves.name: Hazmat Gloves
hazmat.gloves.description: Gloves made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmat.jacket.name: Hazmat Jacket
hazmat.jacket.description: A Jacket made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmat.pants.name: Hazmat Pants
hazmat.pants.description: Trousers made from radiation resistant rubber.

attire.hide.boots.name: Hide Boots
attire.hide.boots.description: Boots made from the hide of an animal.

attire.hide.pants.name: Hide Pants
attire.hide.pants.description: Trousers made from the hide of an animal.

attire.hide.poncho.name: Hide Poncho
attire.hide.poncho.description: A Poncho made from the hide of an animal.

attire.hide.vest.name: Hide Vest
attire.hide.vest.description: A Vest made from the hide of an animal.

weapon.mod.holosight.name: Holosight
weapon.mod.holosight.description: Uses laser projection to create a holographic sight which is always pointing at the target regardless of view angle.

hq.metal.ore.name: High Quality Metal Ore
hq.metal.ore.description: A rock containing High Quality Metal. Can be smelted in a furnace.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 20 seconds to get x1 High Quality Metal

humanmeat.burned.name: Burned Human Meat
humanmeat.burned.description: Burned Meat from a human being. Consuming will damage your health.

humanmeat.cooked.name: Cooked Human Meat
humanmeat.cooked.description: Meat from a human being. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

humanmeat.raw.name: Raw Human Meat
humanmeat.raw.description: Raw human meat. Consuming will damage your health.

humanmeat.spoiled.name: Spoiled Human Meat
humanmeat.spoiled.description: Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

jacket.snow.name: Snow Jacket - Red
jacket.snow.description: A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.

jackolantern.angry.name: Jack O Lantern Angry
jackolantern.angry.description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

jackolantern.happy.name: Jack O Lantern Happy
jackolantern.happy.description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

knife.bone.name: Bone Knife
knife.bone.description: Melee weapon crafted from bone and wood.

ladder.wooden.wall.name: Wooden Ladder
ladder.wooden.wall.description: A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.

trap.landmine.name: Land Mine
trap.landmine.description: An old military Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

leather.name: Leather
leather.description: Leather from an animal. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.

lock.code.name: Code Lock
lock.code.description: An electronic lock. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.

lock.key.name: Lock
lock.key.description: A Lock that requires a key.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.

lmg.m249.name: M249
lmg.m249.description: High damage, high rate of fire, belt fed light machinegun

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.

machete.name: Machete
machete.description: A brutal weapon with good range.

map.name: Paper Map
map.description:
Helps you figure out where you are. You can annotate the map by right-clicking and drawing on it.

Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).

mask.bandana.name: Bandana Mask
mask.bandana.description: A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.

bearmeat.burned.name: Burnt Bear Meat
bearmeat.burned.description: Bear Meat that has been overcooked

bearmeat.name: Bear Meat
bearmeat.description: Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health.

meat.pork.burned.name: Burned Pork
meat.pork.burned.description: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long

meat.pork.cooked.name: Cooked Pork
meat.pork.cooked.description: Cooked pork, all ready to eat

wolfmeat.burned.name: Burned Wolf Meat
wolfmeat.burned.description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

wolfmeat.cooked.name: Cooked Wolf Meat
wolfmeat.cooked.description: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

wolfmeat.raw.name: Raw Wolf Meat
wolfmeat.raw.description: Raw Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

wolfmeat.spoiled.name: Spoiled Wolf Meat
wolfmeat.spoiled.description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

metal.facemask.name: Metal Facemask
metal.facemask.description: A protective facemask that deflects direct attacks.

metal.fragments.name: Metal Fragments
metal.fragments.description: Metal Fragments. Smelted from Metal Ore, used in lots of different crafting recipes.

metal.ore.name: Metal Ore
metal.ore.description: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 10 seconds to get x1 Metal Fragments

metal.plate.torso.name: Metal Chest Plate
metal.plate.torso.description: A metal plate covering your torso. Can deflect attacks.

metal.refined.name: High Quality Metal
metal.refined.description: High quality metal suitable for armor and weapons construction.

mining.pumpjack.name: Pump Jack
mining.pumpjack.description: Extracts oil from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of oil available for extraction in any given area.

mining.quarry.name: Mining Quarry
mining.quarry.description: Extracts minerals from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of minerals available for extraction in any given area.

mushroom.name: Mushroom
mushroom.description: A Mushroom found on the ground. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

note.name: Note
note.description: A scrap of paper for leaving notes.

pickaxe.name: Pick Axe
pickaxe.description: A Pickaxe, useful for gathering ore from rocks.

pistol.eoka.name: Eoka Pistol
pistol.eoka.description: A very basic Pistol that fires one Pistol Round at a time.

pistol.semiauto.name: Semi-Automatic Pistol
pistol.semiauto.description: A sem-automatic Pistol. Fires rapidly and with good accuracy.

pookie.bear.name: Pookie Bear
pookie.bear.description: A companion that reminds you of your youth

xmas.present.large.name: Large Present
xmas.present.large.description: A Large Present, the best there is. Unwrap it now!

xmas.present.medium.name: Medium Present
xmas.present.medium.description: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present

xmas.present.small.name: Small Present
xmas.present.small.description: A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present

pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
pumpkin.description: An edible vegetable that can also be worn as a hat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

seed.pumpkin.name: Pumpkin Seed
seed.pumpkin.description: Seeds can be eaten or planted.

target.reactive.name: Reactive Target
target.reactive.description: A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.

riot.helmet.name: Riot Helmet
riot.helmet.description: A makeshift riot Helmet. Great at deflecting melee attacks.

roadsign.jacket.name: Road Sign Jacket
roadsign.jacket.description: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Metal Fragments and Leather.

roadsign.kilt.name: Road Sign Kilt
roadsign.kilt.description: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Metal Fragments and Leather.

rock.name: Rock
rock.description: A Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.

rocket.launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
rocket.launcher.description: Shoots rockets slighty farther than North Korea.

salvaged.cleaver.name: Salvaged Cleaver
salvaged.cleaver.description: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.

salvaged.sword.name: Salvaged Sword
salvaged.sword.description: A powerful melee weapon made from a filed-down wrench. Great durability, good damage.

santahat.name: Santa Hat
santahat.description: A santa hat. Ho Ho ho.

shotgun.waterpipe.name: Waterpipe Shotgun
shotgun.waterpipe.description: A Shotgun. Fires a single round before reloading.

shutter.metal.embrasure.a.name: Metal horizontal embrasure
shutter.metal.embrasure.a.description: Static shutter that form a metal horizontal embrasure over your window frame

shutter.metal.embrasure.b.name: Metal Vertical embrasure
shutter.metal.embrasure.b.description: Static shutter that form a metal vertical embrasure over your window frame

shutter.wood.a.name: Wood Shutters
shutter.wood.a.description: Wood shutters that you can open and close.

sign.hanging.banner.large.name: Large Banner Hanging
sign.hanging.banner.large.description: A large banner hanging on a wall

sign.hanging.name: Two Sided Hanging Sign
sign.hanging.description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings

sign.hanging.ornate.name: Two Sided Ornate Hanging Sign
sign.hanging.ornate.description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings

sign.pictureframe.landscape.name: Landscape Picture Frame
sign.pictureframe.landscape.description: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings

sign.pictureframe.portrait.name: Portrait Picture Frame
sign.pictureframe.portrait.description: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings

sign.pictureframe.tall.name: Tall Picture Frame
sign.pictureframe.tall.description: A tall canvas for artists paintings

sign.pictureframe.xl.name: XL Picture Frame
sign.pictureframe.xl.description: An extra large canvas for artists paintings

sign.pictureframe.xxl.name: XXL Picture Frame
sign.pictureframe.xxl.description: A double extra large canvas for artists paintings

sign.pole.banner.large.name: Large Banner on pole
sign.pole.banner.large.description: A large banner hanging on a pole

sign.post.double.name: Double Sign Post
sign.post.double.description: A double sign post that you can plant into terrain

sign.post.single.name: Single Sign Post
sign.post.single.description: A single sign post that you can plant into terrain

sign.post.town.name: One Sided Town Sign Post
sign.post.town.description: A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain

sign.post.town.roof.name: Two Sided Town Sign Post
sign.post.town.roof.description: A double sided town sign post, with roof, that you can plant into terrain

sign.wooden.huge.name: Huge Wooden Sign
sign.wooden.huge.description: A 6-meter by 3-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.large.name: Large Wooden Sign
sign.wooden.large.description: A 3-meter by 1.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.medium.name: Wooden Sign
sign.wooden.medium.description: A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.small.name: Small Wooden Sign
sign.wooden.small.description: A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

weapon.mod.silencer.name: Silencer
weapon.mod.silencer.description: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.

sleepingbag.name: Sleeping Bag
sleepingbag.description: A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.

descriptions: 300 second cooldown between respawns. Triggers cooldown on all beds within 50m.

small.oil.refinery.name: Small Oil Refinery
small.oil.refinery.description: A small refinery which can produce Low Grade Fuel from Crude Oil.

stash.small.name: Small Stash
stash.small.description: A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.

smallwaterbottle.name: Small Water Bottle
smallwaterbottle.description: Small Water Bottle. Fill it from Water Catchers.

smg.2.name: Custom SMG
smg.2.description: A rapid-firing Machine Gun. Sacrifices accuracy and distance for speed.

spikes.floor.name: Wooden Floor Spikes
spikes.floor.description: A set of spikes that will slow down and hurt anyone that walks over them.

stocking.large.name: SUPER Stocking
stocking.large.description: A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!

stocking.small.name: Small Stocking
stocking.small.description: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking

sulfur.name: Sulfur
sulfur.description: Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.

sulfur.ore.name: Sulfur Ore
sulfur.ore.description: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.

descriptions: Can be cooked for 5 seconds to get x1 Sulfur

supply.signal.name: Supply Signal
supply.signal.description: Green signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.

surveycharge.name: Survey Charge
surveycharge.description: Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.

syringe.medical.name: Medical Syringe
syringe.medical.description: Heal yourself or others with this syringe. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

targeting.computer.name: Targeting Computer
targeting.computer.description: A computer loaded with software that can analyze a video and produce rotational deltas to individual objects contained in the feed

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.

tshirt.name: T-Shirt
tshirt.description: A t-shirt with very short sleeves.

wall.external.high.stone.name: High External Stone Wall
wall.external.high.stone.description: A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.

wall.external.high.name: High External Wooden Wall
wall.external.high.description: A high wooden wall used to keep people off your property.

wall.frame.cell.gate.name: Prison Cell Gate
wall.frame.cell.gate.description: A prison cell gate to lock things behind bars

wall.frame.shopfront.name: Shop Front
wall.frame.shopfront.description: A shop front to do commerce

wall.window.bars.metal.name: Metal Window Bars
wall.window.bars.metal.description: Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window

wall.window.bars.toptier.name: Reinforced Window Bars
wall.window.bars.toptier.description: Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.

wall.window.bars.wood.name: Wooden Window Bars
wall.window.bars.wood.description: Window bars made out of wood. They'll stop people climbing through your window, but probably not for very long.

water.catcher.large.name: Large Water Catcher
water.catcher.large.description: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew.

water.catcher.small.name: Small Water Catcher
water.catcher.small.description: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew.

hat.wolf.name: Wolf Headdress
hat.wolf.description: A headdress made out of the scraped out head of a wolf.

wood.name: Wood
wood.description: Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.

wood.armor.jacket.name: Wood Chestplate
wood.armor.jacket.description: A shoddy piece of body armor made from Wood and Cloth.

wood.armor.pants.name: Wood Armor Pants
wood.armor.pants.description: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from Wood and Cloth.
